statements: SELECT * FROM user_access_control WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM user_access_control WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM user_access_control WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_access_control WHERE role = 'guest' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_access_control;
SELECT * FROM user_access_control WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_access_control WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_access_control;
SELECT * FROM user_access_control WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_access_control WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE device_name = 'Mobile';
SELECT username FROM users WHERE id >= 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_name, access_level FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' AND password = 'secure123';
SELECT device_name FROM access_control WHERE access_level = 'admin' LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, a.device_name FROM users u JOIN access_control a ON u.id = a.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users, roles, user_roles WHERE users.user_id = user_roles.user_id AND roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id ASC, role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT user_id, username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name = 'read';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT users.user_id, users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, COUNT(*) AS permissions_count FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id GROUP BY users.username, roles.role_name;
